long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension conveniently helps you to keep your finger on the pulse of your city's vibes
Get to know about exciting events happening around you - local places for activities.

This extension is based on Google Alert- events through out your city in real time.

The extension also shows events that are popular and upcoming on the weekend, so you can plan ahead:

- Save your favorite events

- Search for all the events that you can possibly attend.

- Search local restaurants

- Search activities for singles- mingle with the cool kids!

-Search hot spots for families activities, workshops, and shopping

- Search for networking events to meet entrepreneurs, and network with like minded individuals.
.
